summary: This is a forwarded email from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York regarding a 'Request to Staff' for inmate Feliciano Favela. It appears to be an internal prison administrative communication, possibly related to inmate management or a request made by the inmate.

persons.name: Feliciano Favela
persons.context: Inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, subject of a 'Request to Staff' communication.

events.title: Request to Staff for Inmate Favela
events.description: An internal prison communication regarding a 'Request to Staff' for inmate Feliciano Favela was sent.

keyFacts: The document is a forwarded email dated August 14, 2019, from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The subject is a 'Request to Staff' for inmate Feliciano Favela, registration number 60103380.
The document is marked as 'CONFIDENTIAL' and has identifiers 'SDNY_00008944' and 'EFTA00139294'.
